subject: Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Taj Smith of the Indianapolis Colts is one of the fringe players, with only a few years of experience, left in limbo by the N.F.L.’s lockout.
snippet: Taj Smith of the Indianapolis Colts is one of the fringe players, with only a few years of experience, left in limbo by the N.F.L.’s lockout.
